3.1. Beamline¶

3.1.1. Interfaces¶

class bcm.beamline.interfaces.IBeamline(name, bases=(), attrs=None, __doc__=None, __module__=None)

A beamline object.

3.1.2. MX Beamline¶

class bcm.beamline.mx.MXBeamline(filename)

An MX Beamline

MXBeamline.setup()

Set up and register the beamline devices.

3.1.3. Remote Client¶

class bcm.beamline.remote.BeamlineClient
BeamlineClient.setup(remote)
